column1: '''The Window on the West (scene)''' is the thirty-first scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''  and the fortieth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
